channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-22053] zookeeper URL links in documentation are failing with 404
item.description:
zookeeper URL changed from hadoop.apache.org to zookeeper.apache.org

E.g: Below URL failing with 404
http://hadoop.apache.org/zookeeper/docs/current/zookeeperProgrammers.html#ch_zkSessions
should be changed to:
https://zookeeper.apache.org/doc/current/zookeeperProgrammers.html#ch_zkSessions
item.summary: zookeeper URL links in documentation are failing with 404

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

subrat.mishra It looks like other than what you modified in the patch, the old URLs exist in the following docs:
src/main/asciidoc/_chapters/zookeeper.adoc
src/main/asciidoc/_chapters/hbase-default.adoc
Thanks brfrn169 for reviewing. I have modified in the other docs as well.

Since we use ZooKeeper version 3.4.10 within HBase it would have been better to point to that version in the documentation too.

https://github.com/apache/hbase/blob/master/pom.xml#L1547

https://zookeeper.apache.org/doc/r3.4.10/index.html
Need to change ZooKeeper version to 3.4.10 as suggested by tamaas
Thanks tamaas for the review, I have changed the zookeeper version to 3.4.10 in the addendum patch.
I pushed the addendum. Thanks subrat.mishra (and tamaas for review)
